featured.text: Many scientists, however, say there is no evidence that Blue Monday causes any more sadness than other specific days of the year.
Recent research has found lots of evidence to the drug company’s claims about its “miracle” tablets for curing cancer.
There is evidence of onions being used for culinary and medicinal purposes all over the ancient world.
The claim that eating chocolate can prevent heart disease is _____ because there is not enough scientific evidence to support it.

other.text: Though lacking scientific evidence, this belief is widely seen in books, magazines, and television shows.
This story may sound highly credible, but there seems to be no solid evidence that it inspired the creation of the 35 we know of today as fortune cookies.

definition.en_def: Information or signs that help to prove something.
definition.example: The detective found new evidence that could solve the case.
